title: High-Fidelity Nursing Simulation and Reflective Debriefing for Leadership Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental nursing theory, clinical experience, and foundational team leadership knowledge
context.additional_context: Operated in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, targeting mid-career nursing professionals in managerial/leadership roles

learning_goals: Learners make clinical decisions in response to patient status changes with 80%+ accuracy through real-time high-fidelity simulation
Learners systematically analyze simulation experiences and develop improvement plans using reflective debriefing
Learners execute effective communication and crisis management strategies as leaders in team-based scenarios

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
